Package org.wattdepot.common.util.logger

Provides a Logger for WattDepot services.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTTPClientHelperFilter
    HTTPClientHelperFilter - Filters out the org.restlet.ext.httpclient start and stop log messages.
    LoggerUtil
    Provides a convenience method for Restlet logging that adjusts the output Handlers.
    OneLineFormatter
    Provides a one line formatter for use with WattDepot logging.
    WattDepotLogger
    Supports logging of informational and error messages by a service.
    WattDepotLoggerUtil
    WattDepotLoggerUtil logger utilities for WattDepot.

Package org.wattdepot.common.util.logger Description

Provides a Logger for WattDepot services.
